channel.title: Quantified Self on Brettrics
channel.description: Recent content in Quantified Self on Brettrics

item.title: Quantified Self â€“ Analysis of my Time
item.description: Almost every day I am looking at data either for my job or personal development. A lot of the time I am looking at data that is describing something like TSA claims or the metallurgy of bicycles. As an analyst, I am always trying to synthesize stories from data to help bring insight to my team. Now I am starting to look at my habits and figure out how I can synthesize stories about myself.
